Pet Portrait AI

Transform your pet photos into beautiful, portrait-style paintings with the power of AI. Upload or snap a picture and save a unique artwork of your furry friend.

Download on the App Store See features Privacy policy

Pet Portrait AI makes it easy to create stunning, artistic portraits of your pets. Whether you want to capture your dog’s playful grin or your cat’s regal pose, simply take or upload a photo and let the app turn it into a painting you can save and share. Perfect for pet lovers, gift-givers, and anyone who wants to celebrate their animal companions.

Why you’ll love it

AI-powered portraits

Upload or snap a photo of your pet and instantly get a portrait-style painting, crafted by advanced AI.

Unique results

Get a totally unique result each time you create a portrait - never the same image created twice!

Easy to use

No art skills required—just your phone and a photo of your pet to get started.

High-quality downloads

Save your pet’s portrait in high resolution, perfect for printing or sharing online.

Share with friends

Easily share your pet’s artwork with friends and family, or post it on social media.

Privacy-first

You control your photos and data. Enjoy a clear privacy policy and easy-to-use controls for peace of mind.

How it works

  1. Capture or upload: Open Pet Portrait AI and take a photo of your pet, or select one from your library.
  2. Choose a style: Pick from a range of portrait painting styles to suit your taste.
  3. Create: Let the AI transform your pet’s photo into a beautiful painting.
  4. Save & share: Download your artwork in high quality and share it with friends or on social media.

Screenshots

Get Pet Portrait AI

FAQ

Does Pet Portrait AI work offline?

An internet connection is required to generate portraits. You can still take or select photos for later use.

Are my pet photos public by default?

No. Your photos are private unless you choose to share them.

Which devices are supported?

Pet Portrait AI runs on iPhone and iPad with recent iOS/iPadOS versions. See the App Store for details.

How is my data handled?

Your privacy is a priority. Read the Privacy Policy for full details.

Is Pet Portrait AI free?

The app costs the equivalent of $2.99 to purchase, but then benefit for unlimited usage.

Support

Questions or feedback? Email cloud.point88@gmail.com.
